DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy two treatment Autologous Muscle Derived Cells Urinary Sphincter Repair ( AMDC-USR ) compare placebo treatment stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) adult female patient . Two-thirds participant receive AMDC-USR ( injection cell ) one-third receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Two Treatments Autologous Muscle Derived Cells Female Urinary Sphincter Repair
DOC.detailed_description: Stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) accidental loss urine due physical activity , laughing , cough , sneeze . Autologous Muscle Derived Cells Urinary Sphincter Repair ( AMDC-USR ) involve medical procedure participant 's muscle cell collect , process , injected tissue urinary passage . This double-blind randomized study , mean neither participant , study doctor know treatment group participant . Participants randomly choose receive injection placebo option receive injection cell completion blind portion study participation ( 12 month ) .
DOC.criteria: Adult female patient primary moderatetosevere symptoms SUI least 6 month , confirm patient medical history clinical symptom , include focused incontinence evaluation . Must willing able comply study procedure , mentally competent able understand study requirement , must agree read sign informed consent form prior studyrelated procedure . Must complete least 80 % screen 3day diary . Patient symptom urge incontinence confirm basic evaluation etiology patient medical history , include focused incontinence history . Patient symptom mixed urinary incontinence urge incontinence predominant factor . Patient stress urinary incontinence symptom less 6 month prior sign inform consent . Patient previously attempt conservative treatment prior sign inform consent . ( Examples conservative treatment include behavior modification , bladder exercise , biofeedback , pelvic floor muscle therapy , etc . ) Patient BMI â‰¥ 35 . Patient routinely 2 episode awaken void normal sleeping hour .
